column1: in memory of joseph f. powers -- flora funeral service| first: last: born: september 10
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:flora funeral service
column8: age 72 of union hall died friday
column10: 2015. he was preceded in death by his parents
column11: irving and bridie powers. surviving are his wife
column13: randall damon and patrick powers; two grandsons; and sister
column14: sandra collins. mr. powers attended st. francis of assisi catholic church. private services will be held in new york at a later date. arrangements by flora funeral service & cremation center
